wikipedia_page.main: Ernest Frederick Edds (19 March 1926 – 7 June 2017) was an English footballer who played as a forward. He made 190 appearances in the Football League for Plymouth Argyle, Blackburn Rovers, Torquay United and Swindon Town.

link_mentions.page: List of Torquay United F.C. seasons

response: *Ernie Edds, footballer, was born in Portsmouth
*Ernie Edds, 91, English footballer (Plymouth Argyle, Torquay United).One of the oldest Blackburn Rovers players, Ernie Edds, has died at the age of 91
